insert into place(placeNo, placeImage, placeType, placeName, placeIntro, placeAddr1, placeAddr2, placeAddr3, placeAddr4, placeTel, placeURL, placePerCnt, placeUseTime, placeNotUseDay, placeCost, placeCostChoice, placeParking, placeContent, comId) values(#{placeNo}, #{placeImage}, #{placeType}, #{placeName}, #{placeIntro}, #{placeAddr1}, #{placeAddr2}, #{placeAddr3}, #{placeAddr4}, #{placeTel}, #{placeURL}, #{placePerCnt}, #{placeUseTime}, #{placeNotUseDay}, #{placeCost}, #{placeCostChoice}, #{placeParking}, #{placeContent}, #{comId})
mapper.select: select * from place order by placeNo desc
